name: Quinoa Soup with Kale and Potatoes
description: This quinoa soup with kale and carrots has been one of my favorite soups for a really long time. It's super easy to make, packed with nutrients, and so yummy! Besides, it's of course vegan and also gluten-free!

recipeInstructions.text: Heat some oil in a large pot and sauté the onion for about 3 minutes. For an oil-free version, you can also sauté the onions in water.
recipeInstructions.name: Heat some oil in a large pot and sauté the onion for about 3 minutes. For an oil-free version, you can also sauté the onions in water.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the remaining ingredients and cook for 20 minutes (with a closed lid).
recipeInstructions.name: Add the remaining ingredients and cook for 20 minutes (with a closed lid).

recipeInstructions.text: Sprinkle with fresh chopped parsley and serve with whole-wheat baguette.
recipeInstructions.name: Sprinkle with fresh chopped parsley and serve with whole-wheat baguette.
